info.title: HubSpot Conversations V2
info.description: The HubSpot conversations services enable you to manage and interact with the conversations inbox, channels, and messages.

get.description: Retrieve a list of conversations inboxes.

delete.description: Archives a single thread. The thread will be permanently deleted 30 days after placed in an archived state.

patch.description: Updates a single thread. Either a thread's status can be updated, or the thread can be restored.

get.summary: Get the original content of a single message
get.description: Returns the complete original text and rich text bodies of a message. This will be different from the text and rich text in the message itself if the message's truncationStatus is anything other than NOT_TRUNCATED.

get.summary: Get message history for a thread
get.description: Retrieve a list of message history for a thread.

post.summary: Send a message to a thread
post.description: Send a new message on a thread at the current timestamp.
Resolve actors identifiers to the underlying actors and participants.

get.description: Retrieve a list of channel accounts.

post.description: Generates a new visitor identification token. This token will be unique every time this endpoint is called, even if called with the same email address. This token is temporary and will expire after 12 hours.

x-ms-openai-manifest.modelDescription: This is a Copilot plugin for the HubSpot Conversations service.
